entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Surgeon_General @WhiteHouse Blacks and Latinos are stepping up they provide all the essential services for most of the nation which is why so many of them are turning up sick and dying from covid-19 because they're out in the public taking care of America
